body_html: Some more datapoints. This also breaks the Anaconda builds when using the default gflags from the anaconda channel, but seems to work when you use the gflags from conda-forge instead. The gflags in the anaconda channel has not been updated for months, so that shouldn't be the cause. The cause must be some recent change in our build somewhere; the failures go back about a day, so a recent commit is probably the cause. None of the recent commits look that relevant though. Also, all the linux builds are fine, so whatever change caused this somehow only affects osx
